amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds made available by this Act from being obligated, expended, or otherwise made available to the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 249 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 249 (Roll no. 311).
